ctk::AlignedBase

Detailed Description

template<int _ALIGN = 128, typename _ALLOC = AlignedAllocator<char, _ALIGN>>
class ctk::AlignedBase< _ALIGN, _ALLOC >

AlignedBase: an abstract class which forces 'new' to allocate an aligned buffer and is supposed to be a super class of user data types.
